title: Part F
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide the correct answer and/or a valid justification, consistent with part (e).

  • The conjugate base, C 7 H 5 O 3 − MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F49@ . When pH=4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGWbGaaeisaiabg2da9iaaisdaaaa@3C7D@ , the titration is beyond the half-equivalence point, where [ HC 7 H 5 O 3 ]=[ C 7 H 5 O 3 − ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49F4@ . Thus, the molar concentration of [ C 7 H 5 O 3 − ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4121@ must be greater than [ HC 7 H 5 O 3 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40C8@

    OR

  • The conjugate base, C 7 H 5 O 3 − MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F49@ . Because the pH MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGWbGaaeisaaaa@3AB9@ of the solution is greater than the p K a MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EE6@ of the acid, the majority of the molecules will be deprotonated.

The response provides the correct answer and a valid justification, consistent with part (e).

  • The conjugate base, C 7 H 5 O 3 − MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F49@ . When pH=4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGWbGaaeisaiabg2da9iaaisdaaaa@3C7D@ , the titration is beyond the half-equivalence point, where [ HC 7 H 5 O 3 ]=[ C 7 H 5 O 3 − ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@49F4@ . Thus, the molar concentration of [ C 7 H 5 O 3 − ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4121@ must be greater than [ HC 7 H 5 O 3 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40C8@

    OR

  • The conjugate base, C 7 H 5 O 3 − MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F49@ . Because the pH MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGWbGaaeisaaaa@3AB9@ of the solution is greater than the p K a MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EE6@ of the acid, the majority of the molecules will be deprotonated.
